Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: iso8601(includeTime:)
Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Specifies ISO 8601 output, such as 1937-11-23T15:30:32-08:00, with time optionally included.

Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: relative(_:)
Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Specifies relative date formatting, such as Today, 9:41 AM, with the specified time style.

Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: howLongAgoUntil
Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Specifies how long ago/until formatting, such as 82 years ago.

Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: custom(_:)
Enums/DateFormatStyle.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Specifies a custom date format following the Unicode Technical Standard #35. For example, “EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss Z” to specify RFC 2822 output.

Protocols/FileFilterProperty.html#/s:14S.abstract: The name of the property as used in the Shortcuts app.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: fileFilter
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: The inner FileFilter represented by this value.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(is:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is equal to the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isNot:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is not equal to the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(contains:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property contains the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(doesNotContain:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property does not contain the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(beginsWith:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property begins with the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(endsWith:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property ends with the text argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isExactly:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is equal to the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isNotExactly:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is not equal to the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isLargerThan:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is larger than the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isLargerThanOrEqualTo:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is larger than or equal to the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isSmallerThan:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is smaller than the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isSmallerThanOrEqualTo:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is smaller than or equal to the file size argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isExactly:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is equal to the date or variable argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isNotExactly:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is not equal to the date or variable argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isAfter:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is after the date or variable argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isBefore:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is before the date or variable argument.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: isToday
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is today.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isBetween:and:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is between the dates or variable arguments.

Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(isInTheLast:)
Structs/FileFiltering.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the value with a filter that keeps files whose property is in the time period represented by the time span argument.

Structs/FileFilter.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.name: encode(to:)
Structs/FileFilter.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.abstract: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: bytes
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of bytes.

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: KB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of kilobytes (1,000 bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: MB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of megabytes (1,000,000 bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: GB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of gigabytes (1 billion bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: TB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of terabytes (1 trillion bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: PB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of petabytes (1,000 trillion bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: EB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of exabytes (1 million trillion bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.name: ZB
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html#/s:14SwiftShort.abstract: A unit respresenting a number of zettabyte (1 billion trillion bytes).

Enums/ByteCountUnit.html.name: ByteCountUnit
Enums/ByteCountUnit.html.abstract: A unit of information supported by the Shortcuts app. See FileSize for usage.

Structs/FileFilter.html.abstract: A filter that can be applied to a file.

Protocols/FileFilterConvertible.html.abstract: A value that can be converted to a FileFilter.

Structs/FileFiltering.html.name: FileFiltering
Structs/FileFiltering.html.abstract: Represents a FileFilterConvertible value by means of a property on such a file.

Protocols/FileFilterProperty.html.name: FileFilterProperty
Protocols/FileFilterProperty.html.abstract: Represents a property that can be used to filter a collection of files.

Structs/FileSize.html.name: FileSize
Structs/FileSize.html.abstract: A data size represented by a floating-point number and a unit of information or variable.

Enums/FilterSet.html.name: FilterSet
Enums/FilterSet.html.abstract: Represents one or many filter-convertible values that combine to reduce a set of files.

Enums/SortOrder.html.name: SortOrder
Enums/SortOrder.html.abstract: Represents a method by which to sort a collecton of values.

Structs/TimeSpanValue.html.name: TimeSpanValue
Structs/TimeSpanValue.html.abstract: A time duration represented by a floating-point number and a time unit or variable.

Enums/TimeUnit.html.name: TimeUnit
Enums/TimeUnit.html.abstract: A unit of time supported by the Shortcuts app. See TimeSpanValue for usage.

Protocols/VariableDateValueConvertible.h.name: VariableDateValueConvertible
Protocols/VariableDateValueConvertible.h.abstract: Represents a value that can be converted into a variable date value, such as a Variable or a Date.

Protocols/ConditionTextOperandConvertibl.abstract: A text operand that represents this value.

Protocols/ConditionNumberOperandConverti.abstract: A number operand that represents this value.

Enums/ConditionNumberOperand.html#/s:14S.abstract: Creates an instance initialized to the specified floating-point value.

Enums/ConditionNumberOperand.html#/s:14S.abstract: Creates an instance initialized to the specified integer value.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: is(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable equals the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isNot(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable does not equal the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: hasAnyValue(_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable has any value.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: doesNotHaveAnyValue(_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable does not have any value.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: contains(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable contains the specified text.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: doesNotContain(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable does not contain the specified text.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: beginsWith(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable begins with the specified text.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: endsWith(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable ends with the specified text.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isGreaterThan(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable is greater than the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isGreaterThanOrEqualTo(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable is greater than or equal to the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isLessThan(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable is less than the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isLessThanOrEqualTo(_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable is less than or equal to the condition operand.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: isBetween(_:_:_:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: This condition evaluates to true if the variable is between the two condition operands.

Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.name: encode(to:)
Enums/Condition.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts.abstract: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

Enums/Condition.html.name: Condition
Enums/Condition.html.abstract: The evaluated logic that determines which branch to follow. Evaluated by If shortcuts.

Enums/ConditionNumberOperand.html.name: ConditionNumberOperand
Enums/ConditionNumberOperand.html.abstract: An operand for a Condition that can represent either a Number or a Variable.

Protocols/ConditionNumberOperandConverti.name: ConditionNumberOperandConvertible
Protocols/ConditionNumberOperandConverti.abstract: Represents a value that can be converted into a ConditionNumberOperand, such as a Number or Variable.

Enums/ConditionOperand.html.name: ConditionOperand
Enums/ConditionOperand.html.abstract: An operand for a Condition that can represent either a Number, a Variable, or Text.

Protocols/ConditionOperandConvertible.ht.name: ConditionOperandConvertible
Protocols/ConditionOperandConvertible.ht.abstract: Represents a value that can be converted into a ConditionOperand, such as a Number, Variable, Text, or String.

Enums/ConditionTextOperand.html.name: ConditionTextOperand
Enums/ConditionTextOperand.html.abstract: An operand for a Condition that can represent a Text value.

Protocols/ConditionTextOperandConvertibl.name: ConditionTextOperandConvertible
Protocols/ConditionTextOperandConvertibl.abstract: Represents a value that can be converted into a ConditionTextOperand, such as a Variable, Text, or String.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2eeoi.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable equals the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2neoi.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable does not equal the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1loiy.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable is greater than the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2leoi.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable is greater than or equal to the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1goiy.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable is less than the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2geoi.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable is less than or equal to the right-hand condition operand.

Conditions.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2teoi.abstract: Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable falls between the range in the right-hand condition operand.
Makes a condition that evaluates to true if the left-hand variable falls between the range in the right-hand condition operand.

Protocols/CalculationOperandConvertible..name: calculationOperand
Protocols/CalculationOperandConvertible..abstract: A calculation operand that represents this value.

Enums/CalculationOperand.html#/s:14Swift.name: encode(to:)
Enums/CalculationOperand.html#/s:14Swift.abstract: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.name: add(_:_:)
Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.abstract: Adds the left operand to the right operand.

Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.name: subtract(_:_:)
Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.abstract: Subtracts the right operand from the left operand.

Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.name: divide(_:_:)
Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.abstract: Divides the left operand by the right operand.

Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.name: askEachTime(_:_:)
Enums/Calculation.html#/s:14SwiftShortcu.abstract: Runs a calculation based on the user’s input.

Enums/Calculation.html.name: Calculation
Enums/Calculation.html.abstract: A calculable expression to be used in conjunction with the Calculate shorcut.

Protocols/CalculationOperandConvertible..name: CalculationOperandConvertible
Protocols/CalculationOperandConvertible..abstract: Represents a value that can be used as a operand in a Calculation.

Calculations.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1po.abstract: Makes a calculation that adds the left-hand and right-hand arguments.

Calculations.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1so.abstract: Makes a calculation that subtracts the right-hand from the left-hand argument.

Calculations.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1mo.abstract: Makes a calculation the multiplies the left-hand and right-hand arguments.

Calculations.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts1do.abstract: Makes a calculation that divides the left-hand from the right-hand argument.

Structs/URLEncode/Operation.html.name: Operation
Structs/URLEncode/Operation.html.abstract: Controls whether percent escapes are added or removed.

Structs/SetLowPowerMode/Operation.html.name: Operation
Structs/SetLowPowerMode/Operation.html.abstract: A target state of Low Power Mode.

Structs/If.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2IfV_.name: init(_:groupingIdentifier:then:else:)
Structs/If.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts2IfV_.abstract: Initializes the shortcut with both “then” and “else” branches.

Structs/ChooseFromList/SelectionMode.htm.name: single
Structs/ChooseFromList/SelectionMode.htm.abstract: Only one item may be chosen from the list.

Structs/ChooseFromList/SelectionMode.htm.name: multiple(selectAllInitially:)
Structs/ChooseFromList/SelectionMode.htm.abstract: Multiple items may be chosen from the list.

Structs/AskForInput.html.name: AskForInput
Structs/AskForInput.html.abstract: Prompts the user to enter a piece of information.

Structs/BatteryLevel.html.name: BatteryLevel
Structs/BatteryLevel.html.abstract: Outputs the percentage of battery remaining as a number from 0 to 100.

Structs/Calculate.html.name: Calculate
Structs/Calculate.html.abstract: Performs a number operation on the input and returns the result.

Structs/ChangeCase.html.name: ChangeCase
Structs/ChangeCase.html.abstract: Changes the case of the text passed into the action to UPPERCASE, lowercase, or Title Case.

Structs/ChooseFromList.html.name: ChooseFromList
Structs/ChooseFromList.html.abstract: Presents a menu of the items passed as input to the action and outputs the user’s selection.

Structs/ChooseFromMenu.html.name: ChooseFromMenu
Structs/ChooseFromMenu.html.abstract: Presents a menu and runs different actions based on which menu item was chosen.

Structs/Comment.html.name: Comment
Structs/Comment.html.abstract: This action lets you explain how part of a shortcut works. When run, this action does nothing.

Structs/FilterFiles.html.name: FilterFiles
Structs/FilterFiles.html.abstract: Given a list of files, this action returns the files that match the given criteria.

Structs/GetContentsOfURL.html.name: GetContentsOfURL
Structs/GetContentsOfURL.html.abstract: Gets the contents of URLs passed into the action. Useful for downloading files and web content, or for making API requests.

Structs/GetDictionary.html.name: GetDictionary
Structs/GetDictionary.html.abstract: A list of key-value pairs as a dictionary.

Structs/GetType.html.name: GetType
Structs/GetType.html.abstract: Get Type: Returns the type of every item passed as input. For example, if a URL is passed, this action will return “URL”.

Structs/GetURLsFromInput.html.name: GetURLsFromInput
Structs/GetURLsFromInput.html.abstract: Returns any links found in the input.

Structs/If.html.name: If
Structs/If.html.abstract: Tests if a condition is true, and if so, runs the actions inside. Otherwise, the actions under “Otherwise” are run.

Structs/List.html.name: List
Structs/List.html.abstract: Allows you to specify a list of items.

Structs/LogHealthSample.html.name: LogHealthSample
Structs/LogHealthSample.html.abstract: Adds a data point into the Health app. You can log anything that the Health app supports, including your weight, steps taken, running distance, caloric intake and more.

Structs/MakeHTMLFromRichText.html.name: MakeHTMLFromRichText
Structs/MakeHTMLFromRichText.html.abstract: Converts the rich text passed in to HTML text.

Structs/Nothing.html.name: Nothing
Structs/Nothing.html.abstract: The “Nothing” shortcut. This is different from an EmptyShortcut value, which contains no actions.

Structs/Repeat.html.name: Repeat
Structs/Repeat.html.abstract: Repeats the contained actions, running them either a specified number of times or once for each item in an input list.

Structs/SetLowPowerMode.html.name: SetLowPowerMode
Structs/SetLowPowerMode.html.abstract: Sets the device’s Low Power Mode to on or off.

Structs/SetVariable.html.name: SetVariable
Structs/SetVariable.html.abstract: Sets the value of the specified variable to the input of this action.

Structs/ShowAlert.html.name: ShowAlert
Structs/ShowAlert.html.abstract: Displays an alert with a title, a message, and two buttons. If the user selects the OK button, the shortcut continues,. The cancel button stops the shortcut.

Structs/ShowResult.html.name: ShowResult
Structs/ShowResult.html.abstract: Shows the specified text in Siri or in an alert.

Structs/URLEncode.html.name: URLEncode
Structs/URLEncode.html.abstract: Encodes or decodes text passed into the action to be suitable for inclusion in a URL by adding or removing percent escapes when appropriate.

Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.name: init(literalCapacity:interpolationCount:)
Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.abstract: Creates a string interpolation with storage pre-sized for a literal

Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.name: appendLiteral(_:)
Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.abstract: Appends a literal segment of a string interpolation.

Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.name: appendInterpolation(_:)
Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.abstract: Interpolates the given variable’s runtime value into the string literal being created.

Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.name: appendInterpolation(literal:)
Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html#/s.abstract: Interpolates the given value’s textual representation into the

Structs/Text.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts4Te.abstract: Creates a text shortcut that represents a stored string without variables.

Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html.name: StringInterpolation
Structs/Text/StringInterpolation.html.abstract: The string interpolation type used by Text that property encodes Variable values.

Structs/Text.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts4Te.abstract: Creates an instance initialized to the given string value.

Structs/Text.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts4Te.abstract: Creates an instance from a string interpolation.

Structs/Text.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts4Te.name: encode(to:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts4Te.abstract: Encodes this value into the given encoder.

Structs/ShortcutGroup.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: init(content:)
Structs/ShortcutGroup.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Initializes the shortcut group with the specified content.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock()
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds an empty shortcut from a block containing no statements.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Passes a single shortcut written as a child shortcut through unmodified.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildIf(_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Provides support for “if” statements in multi-statement closures, producing an optional shortcut that is serialized only when the condition evaluates to true.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildEither(first:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Provides support for “if-else” statements in multi-statement closures, producing ConditionalContent for the “then” branch.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildEither(second:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Provides support for “if-else” statements in multi-statement closures, producing ConditionalContent for the “else” branch.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 2 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 3 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 4 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 5 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 6 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 7 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 8 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 9 child shortcuts.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.name: buildBlock(_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:_:)
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html#/s:14SwiftSho.abstract: Builds a shortcut composed of 10 child shortcuts.

Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.name: Body
Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.abstract: The type of shortcut representing the body of this shortcut.

Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.name: usingResult(named:uuid:in:)
Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.abstract: Passes the output of this shortcut as a variable that can be referenced in other shortcuts.

Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.name: savingOutput(to:)
Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.abstract: Saves the output of this shortcut into an output variable that can be referenced in other shortcuts.

Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.name: build()
Protocols/Shortcut.html#/s:14SwiftShortc.abstract: Serializes the body of the Shortcut to a file format suitable for opening in the Shortcuts app.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: init(_:)
Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as an Int8.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as an Int64.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as an integer of platform-dependent size.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as a UInt8.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as a UInt64.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: init(_:)
Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Returns a number initialized to contain a given value, treated as a unsigned integer of platform-dependent size.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: init(_:)

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: init(_:)

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: body
Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.abstract: The contents of the shortcut.

Structs/Number.html#/s:14SwiftShortcuts6.name: description

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than that of the second argument.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Structs/Action.html.name: Action
Structs/Action.html.abstract: An smallest representable unit of a shortcut, consistent of an identifier and encodable parameters.

Structs/EmptyShortcut.html.name: EmptyShortcut
Structs/EmptyShortcut.html.abstract: An empty shortcut that has no actions.

Structs/ForEach.html.name: ForEach
Structs/ForEach.html.abstract: A structure that computes shortcuts from an underlying collection of data.

Structs/Number.html.name: Number
Structs/Number.html.abstract: A wrapper for numeric types supported by the Shortcuts app.

Structs/ResultShortcut.html.name: ResultShortcut
Structs/ResultShortcut.html.abstract: A shortcut that wraps another shortcut, passing its result to a closure for reference.

Structs/SavedOutputShortcut.html.name: SavedOutputShortcut
Structs/SavedOutputShortcut.html.abstract: A shortcut that wraps another shortcut, saving its result for later use.

Protocols/Shortcut.html.name: Shortcut
Protocols/Shortcut.html.abstract: A type that represents a user workflow, or a part of one, in the Shortcuts app.

Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html.name: ShortcutBuilder
Enums/ShortcutBuilder.html.abstract: A custom parameter attribute that constructs shortcuts from closures.

Structs/Text.html.name: Text
Structs/Text.html.abstract: A representation of one or more lines of text that can be used in shortcuts.

Structs/TupleShortcut.html.name: TupleShortcut
Structs/TupleShortcut.html.abstract: A shortcut composed of multiple child shortcuts, expressed as a tuple of those values.
